name: m-cutie-t
description: a general-purpose cli & library for automating mqtt interactions.

scripts.build: cd ..; sudo docker build . -t islands -f ./islands-rewrite/Dockerfile; cd islands-rewrite
scripts.add-service: sudo cp ./config/islands.service /etc/systemd/system/islands.service && sudo systemctl enable islands
scripts.update-service: npm run add-service && sudo systemctl restart islands

author: ashton eby
